topic.description: what is the origin of COVID-19
topic.narrative: seeking range of information about the SARS-CoV-2 virus's origin, including its evolution, animal source, and first transmission into humans

topic.description: how does the coronavirus respond to changes in the weather
topic.narrative: seeking range of information about the SARS-CoV-2 virus viability in different weather/climate conditions as well as information related to transmission of the virus in different climate conditions

topic.description: will SARS-CoV2 infected people develop immunity? Is cross protection possible?
topic.narrative: seeking studies of immunity developed due to infection with SARS-CoV2 or cross protection gained due to infection with other coronavirus types

topic.query: how do people die from the coronavirus
topic.description: what causes death from Covid-19?
topic.narrative: Studies looking at mechanisms of death from Covid-19.

topic.description: what drugs have been active against SARS-CoV or SARS-CoV-2 in animal studies?
topic.narrative: Papers that describe the results of testing drugs that bind to spike proteins of the virus or any other drugs in any animal models. Papers about SARS-CoV-2 infection in cell culture assays are also relevant.

topic.description: what types of rapid testing for Covid-19 have been developed?
topic.narrative: Looking for studies identifying ways to diagnose Covid-19 more rapidly.

topic.description: are there serological tests that detect antibodies to coronavirus?
topic.narrative: Looking for assays that measure immune response to COVID-19 that will help determine past infection and subsequent possible immunity.

topic.description: how has lack of testing availability led to underreporting of true incidence of Covid-19?
topic.narrative: Looking for studies answering questions of impact of lack of complete testing for Covid-19 on incidence and prevalence of Covid-19.

topic.description: how has COVID-19 affected Canada
topic.narrative: seeking data related to infections (confirm, suspected, and projected) and health outcomes (symptoms, hospitalization, intensive care, mortality)

topic.description: has social distancing had an impact on slowing the spread of COVID-19?
topic.narrative: seeking specific information on studies that have measured COVID-19's transmission in one or more social distancing (or non-social distancing) approaches

topic.description: what are the guidelines for triaging patients infected with coronavirus?
topic.narrative: Seeking information on any guidelines for prioritizing COVID-19 patients infected with coronavirus based on demographics, clinical signs, serology and other tests.

topic.description: what are best practices in hospitals and at home in maintaining quarantine?
topic.narrative: Seeking information on best practices for activities and duration of quarantine for those exposed and/ infected to COVID-19 virus.

topic.description: what are the transmission routes of coronavirus?
topic.narrative: Looking for information on all possible ways to contract COVID-19 from people, animals and objects

topic.description: what evidence is there related to COVID-19 super spreaders
topic.narrative: seeking range of information related to the number and proportion of super spreaders, their patterns of behavior that lead to spread, and potential prevention strategies targeted specifically toward super spreaders

topic.description: how long can the coronavirus live outside the body
topic.narrative: seeking range of information on the SARS-CoV-2's virus's survival in different environments (surfaces, liquids, etc.) outside the human body while still being viable for transmission to another human

topic.query: how long does coronavirus survive on surfaces
topic.description: how long does coronavirus remain stable on surfaces?
topic.narrative: Studies of time SARS-CoV-2 remains stable after being deposited from an infected person on everyday surfaces in a household or hospital setting, such as through coughing or touching objects.

topic.description: are there any clinical trials available for the coronavirus
topic.narrative: seeking specific COVID-19 clinical trials ranging from trials in recruitment to completed trials with results

topic.description: what are the best masks for preventing infection by Covid-19?
topic.narrative: What types of masks should or should not be used to prevent infection by Covid-19?

topic.description: what type of hand sanitizer is needed to destroy Covid-19?
topic.narrative: Studies assessing chemicals and their concentrations needed to destroy the Covid-19 virus.

topic.description: are patients taking Angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors (ACE) at increased risk for COVID-19?
topic.narrative: Looking for information on interactions between coronavirus and angiotensin converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) receptors, risk for patients taking these medications, and recommendations for these patients.
